i downloaded this game(torrent) before and it worked but then accidentally erased it from my pc and i downloaded again(3days ago) but this time i can't join a server because it says punkbuster ban kick.....i don't understand why i get this ...i tried to re installed the game but it doesnt work it keeps saying the same thing ...i need help please!

ok for those who get the ban kick this is how i fix it! 
Note: it worked for me!
1- Open the folder where you installed cod waw 
2- Click on Key-generator, then generate a cd key, and  write down the cd key in a paper .
3- Open cod waw game, and  go to multiplayer.
(do not create an online profile)~just click no
4- then go to options& control, then click multiplayer options.
5- click on enter cd code, and write the cd key that you wrote down....after that you should be able to play online without getting that annoying punkbuster ban kick/ban ...tell me if it work for you guys.
remember to have fun and don't hack for god's sake
